name: Dog Bones: A BONES Tribute
description:
I made this game for fellow game developer Josh Perry as part of Secret Santa Jam 2020. It's inspired by his jam game, BONES. All of the code and art was created by me in about a month with a little help from the following:

ROG Roguelike Framework for Unity by Fred Vasquez
Grass tileset by Bonsaiheldin
Brick wall tileset by Daniel Siegmund
Music generated using WolframTones
